Some internet portals credit her as '''Ursula Pratts'''.
==Biography== Ãrsula Prats began her career in the soap opera ''[[Secretos de confesiÃ³n]]'', one of her most memorable roles was Maura in the soap opera ''[[TÃº o nadie]]'' with [[LucÃ­a MÃ©ndez]]. The actress began her career when she was invited to conduct a variety show, she gave publicity to the artists. Later on, Ernesto Alonso saw her and offered her first role. Ursula says that in her time of youth, she starred in almost all of the best soap operas.
"I loved making ''Monte calvario'' with LucÃ­a MÃ©ndez, acting alongside [[Jacqueline Andere]] in ''QuiÃ©reme siempre'', that soap opera gave me a lot of satisfactions as an actress", said Ãrsula.
In the soap opera ''Un gancho al corazÃ³n'' she shared credit with [[Otto Sirgo]], [[SebastiÃ¡n Rulli]], and [[Ana MartÃ­n]]. In 2009 she worked in the soap opera ''[[Mi Pecado]]'' playing the role of Matilda - aunt of the villain Lorena.
